biography: Brian Simpson was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, the youngest of 6 children. He went to Upper St. Clair HS for two years, then moved to California in 1981 to finish high school at South Pasadena HS. He played Jr. college football before getting into the film industry. He has been a member of the International Stunt Association for the past 10 years.  IMDb Mini Biography By: Brian Simpson
name: Brian Simpson
